note: All four action tables verified: g_1=(1 6 4 3 7) maps 1->6->4->3->7->1, fixes 2,5. g_2=(1 2 4 5) maps 1->2->4->5->1, fixes 3,6,7. g_1^{-1}=(1 7 3 4 6) is correctly computed as inverse with 1->7->3->4->6->1, fixes 2,5. g_2^{-1}=(1 5 4 2) is correctly computed as inverse with 1->5->4->2->1, fixes 3,6,7. All mappings and fixed points are mathematically correct.
